name: ToiletingADLOrIADL
title: Toileting (ADL or IADL)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of toileting (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to toilet as an adl/iadl.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Toileting (ADL or IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Toileting (ADL or IADL).)

contains.display: Toileting deficit [CCC]
Toileting [QAM]
Toilet use - self-performance during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Toilet use - support provided during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Current ability - toileting [OASIS]
Toilet hygiene during 2 day assessment period [CARE]
Toilet transfer during 2 day assessment period [CARE]
Moving on and off toilet during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Current toileting program or trial during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Bowel toileting program currently being used during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Toilet transferring - functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Toileting hygiene - functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Does your health now limit you in taking care of your personal needs (dress, comb hair, toilet, eat, bathe) [PROMIS]
Are you able to get on and off the toilet [PROMIS]
Are you able to wipe yourself after using the toilet [PROMIS]
I could get up from a regular toilet in past 7 days [PROMIS]
I could get on and off the toilet without using my arms in the past 7 days [NeuroQol.Peds]
I could manage getting on and off the toilet from a wheelchair in the past 7 days [NeuroQol.Peds]
I was able to wipe myself thoroughly after using the toilet in the past 7 days [NeuroQol.Peds]
I was able to pull my pants back up after using the toilet in the past 7 days [NeuroQol.Peds]
Over the past week, are you able to get on and off the toilet [HAQ]
Are you able to sit on and get up from the toilet [PROMIS]

Toileting hygiene - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

Toilet transfer - functional goal during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Need for and availability of a raised toilet seat during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
